title: Eco-Friendly Family Home
description: A sustainable renovation project for a growing family, focusing on eco-friendly materials, energy efficiency, and flexible spaces that adapt to changing needs. The design incorporates natural light, recycled materials, and smart home technology.

images.alt: Open concept living area with sustainable materials
Natural light filled bedroom with eco-friendly furnishings

testimonial.quote: Not only is our home beautiful, but we love knowing that the materials and systems are environmentally responsible. Perfect for raising our children.
testimonial.author: Elena & Carlos R.
